main.name: Hadi Chami
main.description: with 10+ years of Professional Development Experience
main.bio: I'm a Senior software engineer with over ten years of professional development and management experience. Experienced in building end-user applications, managing a technical team of Engineers, and utilizing different languages, environments, and architectures. Seeking new challenges contributing to a team to create powerful applications that empower users and solve complex problems.

education.school: University of North Carolina at Charlotte

work.title: Developer Support Manager
work.description: Responsible for managing the Technical Support and Documentation departments totaling 12+ developers onshore and offshore. Designed, managed, and developed multiple projects while managing the departments. Created project plans, scope documents, statement of works, schedules, and forecasts. Provided timely communications on the impact of the changes and decisions. Developed best practices and tools for project execution and management. Advised other departments as a subject matter expert in various technical areas.

work.title: Developer Support Engineer
work.description: Supported customer development projects in over 5 different programming languages. Assisted with development on internal utilities and projects to increase productivity and efficiency.
